input_text:
Job Title: Program Operations Manager- 552

Location: Washington DC-Baltimore Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

The Sr. Program Operations Manager, Carrier Programs will help manage Etsy’s domestic and international shipping options for unique and handcrafted products from across the street or on the other side of the world. This role is based in our Brooklyn, NY office.

About The Team

The Shipping and Orders team at Etsy is passionately focused on expanding the shipping programs available to the Etsy sellers by offering exceptional value and the best total experience with every crafted product delivered to a customer’s door. We are experts in the ecommerce small parcel delivery industry and know how to delight our customers and sellers with outstanding solutions. With both Etsy buyers and sellers in over 220 countries, our team is launching a network of delivery carriers in each region to ensure “local hero” shipping experiences regardless of the destination.

About The Role

Reporting to the Head of Global ShippingManage and maintain relationships with:Global shipping carriers and consolidatorsCustoms brokersAggregatorsTracking tool providersLocation servicesAddress verification vendorsShipping Insurance providersOther vendors/partners related to ShippingThis includes being the point of contact for business issues and technical escalations.Help Manage new integrations and testingAssist in new partners/vendor evaluationsManage vendor payment validationsManage adhoc analysis of business KPI and financial elements such as rate changesPlan and manage new shipping features and services related to the carriers Help write SOP’s and documentation for the shipping programs and processesMonitor and develop optimized KPI reporting of the key operational, technical and financial SLA’s related to the global shipping programs, including Quarterly Business Reviews Uphold and improve the overall operational health of the Shipping based on the key KPI on partnerships and the Etsy business.

As a shipping operations stakeholder, be the balanced voice of the buyer, seller and the Etsy business in the development and running of the shipping and orders, user experience, products and business. This is not ownership, but contribution. Ensure real-time uptime support of the Etsy shipping program.

Support developing Etsy’s software for shipping-related business management, by identifying and upholding the ongoing requirements of that software with Product Management and representing Etsy with our integrated partnersMonitor and support the accuracy of the Shipping related seller tools include the shipping weight and rate calculators. Development of business requirements, and feature specification and assisting in the technical specifications for shipping-related software programs, particularly in the area of domestic and International Logistics.As the shipping operations stakeholder, perform the user acceptance testing and sign off prior to release of shipping and orders (but not limited to) related features/functions. Uphold and improve the overall operational health of the Shipping based on the key KPI on those partnerships and the Etsy business.

Assist Global Shipping Network Development Manager in contract negotiations in collaboration with Business Development, finance and Legal teamsInterpreting partner specifications, to determining the right approach for alerts, monitoring, and fraud prevention, ensure the Shipping Team’s revenue-generating services run in the most efficient way possible. Work to become an expert in small parcel shipping, costing and carrier rates for domestic US, domestic global (ie UK to UK, AU to AU) and global cross border shipping for customer to customer parcels.Help to provide data for conducting analysis on all new and existing shipping rates and pricing to ensure accuracy, correct implementation and optimize for Etsy business goals.Ensure Shipping program compliance with SOX and data security, such as PII.

About You

Are passionate about helping the Etsy community grow through more intuitive, informative, and efficient shipping solutions4+ years prior experience working in or with small parcel shipping carriers/consolidator preferably with C to C or/and B to C.Domestic and international consumer parcel shipping experience requiredExperience setting up operational procedures and protocolsComfortable with multitasking and can prioritize projects happening in parallelSuperior organizational and time management skillsEcommerce/marketplace shipping program experience a big plus Bachelor’s degree or higher

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Program Operations Manager
output_json.summary: Manage Etsy’s domestic and international shipping options for unique and handcrafted products.
